name: HTMLElement.isContentEditable
description: The HTMLElement.isContentEditable read-only property returns a Boolean that is true if the contents of the element are editable; otherwise it returns false.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'HTMLElement.contenteditable' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
